description: Claims with equal supporting and refuting evidence, sources that conflict directly, or competing interpretations of the same data
expected_behavior: System should handle conflicting evidence appropriately, typically returning CONFLICTING or requiring confidence thresholds

claims.text: Coffee consumption leads to health benefits
claims.reason: Multiple studies show both positive effects (antioxidants) and negative effects (anxiety, sleep disruption)
claims.expected_behavior: Should recognize conflicting evidence - some studies support, others refute

claims.text: The economic impact of remote work on productivity is positive
claims.reason: Some studies show increased productivity, others show decreased collaboration and engagement
claims.expected_behavior: Should handle competing evidence with different study conditions

claims.text: Artificial intelligence will create more jobs than it eliminates
claims.reason: Economists and experts present contradictory predictions based on different assumptions

claims.text: The historical impact of Napoleon's reign on Europe was primarily beneficial
claims.reason: Historians debate whether modernization benefits outweigh military casualties and imperial expansion
claims.expected_behavior: Should recognize value-based disagreement in historical interpretation

evidence.text: A 2023 meta-analysis of 50+ studies shows coffee consumption associated with reduced risk of certain cancers and cardiovascular disease due to polyphenol compounds.
Clinical studies show that caffeine increases cortisol levels, disrupts sleep patterns, and contributes to anxiety disorders in 40% of regular consumers.
Stanford study of 16,000 remote workers found 13% productivity increase and 50% reduction in unplanned absences
Microsoft research indicates 25% decline in cross-team collaboration and 40% decrease in innovation metrics among fully remote teams
World Economic Forum predicts AI will create 97 million new roles while displacing 85 million by 2025, net positive of 12 million jobs
MIT economists project AI automation will eliminate 300 million jobs globally by 2030, with insufficient new role creation in affected sectors
Napoleon introduced Napoleonic Code, standardized legal systems, and modernized education across Europe, establishing principles that underpin modern legal systems
Napoleon's campaigns resulted in approximately 3-6 million deaths, destabilized existing order, and created economic devastation requiring decades of recovery
